item.description: About linux-toolkit.com is a site dedicated to renewing the outdated Linux program manuals with a modern, concise perspective, aiming to eventually cover a wider range of CS concepts and tools. The site provides examples and workflow strategies for both new users as well as those simply needing a quick reference. Please let me know if you have any suggestions, comments, or if you catch a mistake which needs quick fixing. You can find me on GitHub here.
